## FloatMatrix.scalarMultiply() method

Implements multiplication of a matrix by a scalar

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scalarMultiply(scalar: number): Matrix<number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scalar | <code>number</code> | The scalar by which to multiply |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix<number>`
